SELECT a.* FROM raw_material_supplier a
AND a.id = #{param.id}
AND a.unit_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{param.unitName}, '%')
AND a.unit_type LIKE CONCAT('%', #{param.unitType}, '%')
AND a.rms_phone LIKE CONCAT('%', #{param.rmsPhone}, '%')
AND a.rms_address LIKE CONCAT('%', #{param.rmsAddress}, '%')
AND a.user_id = #{param.userId}
AND a.rms_state LIKE CONCAT('%', #{param.rmsState}, '%')
AND a.rms_remarks LIKE CONCAT('%', #{param.rmsRemarks}, '%')

SELECT rms.id,rms.unit_name,rm.id AS rawMaterial_id,rm.platform_raw_materials,rm.supply_raw_materials,rm.status FROM raw_materials rm JOIN rms_rw sm ON rm.id = sm.rm_id JOIN raw_material_supplier rms ON rms.id = sm.rms_id
rms.id = #{id}

SELECT rms.id AS id,rr.id AS rrId,rms.unit_name,rm.id AS rawMaterialId,rm.platform_raw_materials,rm.supply_raw_materials,rm.status AS rmStatus FROM raw_materials rm JOIN rms_rw rr ON rm.id = rr.rm_id JOIN raw_material_supplier rms ON rms.id = rr.rms_id
rms.id = #{id}
